title: Realtime_BillMaher_28032008
description:

and converting it to an avi file using the following command:

  mencoder -oac mp3lame -ovc lavc -delay 0.95 1.flv 2.flt 3.flt 4.flt 5.flt 6.fl t overtime.flt -o realtimebillmaher28032008.avi
